segments.text: I can’t help but smile at the sight of those cookies in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of my own childhood, sneaking treats when no one was watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I remember the risks involved, and my smile fades.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying her plate, it’s almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely oblivious to everything else, especially the mess at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to flow, and I feel a sense of dread building inside me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s balance on that stool makes my stomach churn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He even has a plate ready to catch the cookies, but what if he falls instead?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting with her hand open is so hopeful, yet it adds to the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can’t someone just come to their rescue before it’s too late?
segments.speaker: PAR
